SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEGORYBDLIST WHERE BDCATEGORY = #{bdcategory_Free} ORDER BY BDCODE DESC
SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEGORYBDLIST WHERE BDCATEGORY = #{bdcategory_Question} ORDER BY BDCODE DESC
SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEGORYBDLIST WHERE BDCATEGORY = #{bdcategory_Infomation} ORDER BY BDCODE DESC
SELECT * FROM VIEW_CATEGORYBDLIST WHERE BDCATEGORY = #{bdcategory_Review} ORDER BY BDCODE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_LATESTBOARDLIST
WHERE
(BDTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR BDCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND
BDCATEGORY = '자유'
BDCATEGORY = '질문'
BDCATEGORY = '정보'
BDCATEGORY = '후기'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN,VIEW_LATESTBOARDLIST.* FROM VIEW_LATESTBOARDLIST
WHERE
(BDTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR BDCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
BDNICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND
BDCATEGORY = '자유'
BDCATEGORY = '질문'
BDCATEGORY = '정보'
BDCATEGORY = '후기'
) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${startRow} AND ${endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICEBOARDS WHERE NBSTATE = 1 AND NBFIX != 1
AND
(NBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select bdcode, bdmid, bdtitle, bddate, bdimg, bdstate, bdhits, bdcontents, bdscrap, bdrecommend, bdreply, mnickname as bdnickname from boards b left outer join (select scbdcode, count(*) as bdscrap from scrap group by scbdcode) sc on b.bdcode = sc.scbdcode left outer join (select rcbdcode, count(*) as bdrecommend from recommend group by rcbdcode) rc on b.bdcode = rc.rcbdcode left outer join (select rpbdcode, count(*) as bdreply from reply WHERE RPSTATE=1 group by rpbdcode) rp on b.bdcode = rp.rpbdcode left outer join members m on b.bdmid = m.mid where b.bdcategory='자랑' and b.bdstate='1' order by bdcode desc

select count(*) from roomtotalcount
where bdtitle||bdcontents like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where ${searchType} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, r.* from (select * from roomlist
where bdtitle||bdcontents like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where ${searchType} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by ${searchVal} desc nulls last) r) where rn between ${startRow} AND ${endRow}

SELECT NBCODE,NBMID,NBTITLE,NBCONTENTS,TO_CHAR(NBDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS NBDATE, NBIMG,NBSTATE,NBHITS,MB.MNICKNAME AS NBNICKNAME, NBFIX FROM NOTICEBOARDS NB, MEMBERS MB WHERE NBCODE = #{nbcode} AND NB.NBMID = MB.MID

SELECT BDCODE, BDRGCODE, BDCATEGORY, BDMID, BDTITLE, BDCONTENTS, BDDATE, BDIMG, BDDETAILIMG, BDSTATE, BDHITS, BDRATE, MB.MNICKNAME AS BDNICKNAME, MB.MPROFILE AS BDMPROFILE, MB.MSTATE AS BDMSTATE, RG.RGCODE AS BDRGCODE, RG.RGNAME AS BDRGNAME FROM BOARDS BD, MEMBERS MB, REGION RG WHERE BD.BDMID = MB.MID AND BD.BDRGCODE = RG.RGCODE AND BD.BDCODE = #{bdcode}

select rv.*, sh.scmid as schistory, rch.rcmid as rchistory, wbh.wbmid as wbhistory from roomview rv left outer join (select * from scrap where scmid=#{loginId}) sh on rv.bdcode = sh.scbdcode left outer join (select * from recommend where rcmid=#{loginId}) rch on rv.bdcode = rch.rcbdcode left outer join (select * from warningboards where wbmid=#{loginId}) wbh on rv.bdcode = wbh.wbedbdcode where rv.bdcode=#{bdcode}
SELECT MAX(RPCODE) FROM REPLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE RPBDCODE = #{bdcode} AND RPSTATE = 1

mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDS SET BDCATEGORY = #{bdcategory}, BDRGCODE = #{bdrgcode}, BDTITLE = #{bdtitle}, BDCONTENTS = #{bdcontents}, BDRATE = #{bdrate}, BDIMG = #{bdimg} WHERE BDCODE = #{bdcode}
